pages.title: Map Markers
pages.text: You can make several new markers on your map by right-clicking a block with a map in your hand. The supported blocks are: $(item)Beacons, Beds, Sign Posts, Nether Portal, Bells, Campfires, Conduits, Lodestones, Respawn Anchors, End Portals,$() and $(item)Flags$(). Holding a $(item)Recovery Compass$() will show you the location of your death on the map.
